description: This PHP source file provides a web interface for adding a blocked keyword in a parental control system. It includes HTML markup, embedded PHP for dynamic content, JavaScript for client-side validation and AJAX submission, and server-side logic to handle user input for blocking keywords, including setting block times and days.

methods.name: ready function
methods.description: Initializes page elements, validation rules, and AJAX form submission when document is ready.

methods.name: updateBlockTimeVisibility
methods.description: Enables or disables block time controls based on the 'Always Block' switch state.
